** {{nbt|string|DeathLootTable}}: Name of the loot table to be used when the mob dies. One batch of loot is generated, as defined by the loot table, and the mob drops the generated loot. Works just like {{nbt|string|LootTable}} from [[Chunk format/Lootable]].
** {{nbt|long|DeathLootTableSeed}}: Seed for generating the loot table when the mob dies. Works just like {{nbt|long|LootTableSeed}} from [[Chunk format/Lootable]].
